external_games.name: The Tomorrow War: White Spike Invasion

name: The Tomorrow War: White Spike Invasion
summary: Exterminate the human race in this arcade action shooter! Thirty years in the future, Earth is besieged by a global alien menace. Become the alien threat and destroy the earthlings once and for all as you blast through wave after wave of their remaining forces!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: The Tomorrow War White Spike Sizzle
